description: Numbers n such that n^2 + 3 is prime.
links: Zak Seidov, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Near-Square Prime
mathematica: lst={};Do[If[PrimeQ[n^2+3], Print[n];AppendTo[lst, n]], {n, 10^5}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Aug 21 2008 *)
author: Paul Jobling (paul.jobling(AT)whitecross.com)
